definition: to collapse/to fall into ruins/death of king or emperor/demise
to leak/to divulge/to leave out by mistake/waterclock or hourglass (old)

sentences.english: Metrorrhagia is also gynaecological problems of common diseases.
sentences.chinese: 崩漏是妇科常见病也是疑难症。

sentences.english: According to the symptoms, Anovulatory dysfunctional uterine bleeding belongs to metrorrhagia and metrostaxis in TCM.
sentences.chinese: 根据其症状，无排卵性功血类属于中医“崩漏”范畴。

definition: (TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
condition characterized by thirst, hunger, frequent urination and weight loss, identified in TCM with type 2 diabetes
disorder of internal organs caused by overexertion
illness having to do with obstruction of urine flow/(Chinese medicine)/retention of urine
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
an excess of heat caused by a deficiency in Yin energy (idiom)
